<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrifying Howl](/Feats.aspx?ID=161) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796)

</column>

---

You unleash a terrifying howl. Attempt [Intimidate](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) each enemy within 30 feet. Regardless of the results of your checks, each creature is then temporarily immune to Terrifying Howl for 1 minute.
